version_description:
** 如果你发现 iCloud 推送用不了，请重启 Pin 后重新设置，或者重装 Pin

热烈庆祝 Pin 获得 App Store 2016 年度十佳的推荐，感谢大家长期以来的支持！

这是 2016 年最后一个版本，提前祝大家新年快乐！

本版本推出了在通知中心直接输入和编辑文字的功能，即便在没有剪贴板内容的时候也能轻松使用 Pin！
这是一个史无前例的创新，Pin 实现了在通知中心打开键盘完成输入的可能

*注：需要 iOS 10 及以上系统，

** 如果你发现 iCloud 推送用不了，请重启 Pin 后重新设置，或者重装 Pin

热烈庆祝 Pin 获得 App Store 2016 年度十佳的推荐，感谢大家长期以来的支持！

这是 2016 年最后一个版本，提前祝大家新年快乐！

本版本推出了在通知中心直接输入和编辑文字的功能，即便在没有剪贴板内容的时候也能轻松使用 Pin！
这是一个史无前例的创新，Pin 实现了在通知中心打开键盘完成输入的可能

*注：需要 iOS 10 及以上系统，

# 更新内容
- 移除了支付宝捐赠链接
- 移除了内购捐赠链接
- 移除了关于页面的应用墙页面
- 增加了一个新的 URL Scheme: pinapp://
- 修复了 iCloud 推送开关卡住的问题
- 修复发反馈邮件之后状态栏变白的问题
- 修复在开启系统粗体文本选项之后的视觉问题
- 修复部分英语不准确的问题
- 通知中心小部件视觉微调

如果你喜欢本次更新，请考虑在 App Store 留下一个评分
如果对本次更新不满，欢

# 更新内容
- 移除了支付宝捐赠链接
- 移除了内购捐赠链接
- 移除了关于页面的应用墙页面
- 增加了一个新的 URL Scheme: pinapp://
- 修复了 iCloud 推送开关卡住的问题
- 修复发反馈邮件之后状态栏变白的问题
- 修复在开启系统粗体文本选项之后的视觉问题
- 修复部分英语不准确的问题
- 通知中心小部件视觉微调

如果你喜欢本次更新，请考虑在 App Store 留下一个评分
如果对本次更新不满，欢

本次更新增加了打开链接时支持设置指定的浏览器，同时优化了 iCloud 同步的性能

Pin 的 3.0 版本会带来全新的扩展系统，这需要一点时间来准备，敬请期待

# 浏览器设置方法
打开 app -> 右上角设置按钮 -> 浏览器设置

# 支持浏览器列表
Safari / Chrome / UC / Firefox / QQ / 欧朋 / 夸克 / iCab / 傲游 / 海豚 / 2345 / Pin 内置浏览器

如果你喜欢

Pin 的 3.0 版本会带来全新的扩展系统，这需要一点时间来准备，敬请期待

# 浏览器设置方法
打开 app -> 右上角设置按钮 -> 浏览器设置

# 支持浏览器列表

如果你喜欢

# Changes
- You can set a specific browser when open a link
- iCloud improvements

# How to change browser
Open app -> top-right button -> Default Browser

# Available browsers
Safari / Chrome / UC / Firefox / QQ / Opera / Qu

# Changes
- You can set a specific browser when open a link
- iCloud improvements

# How to change browser
Open app -> top-right button -> Default Browser

# Available browsers
Safari / Chrome / UC / Firefox / QQ / Opera / Qu

- Better inputting experience in widget
- Swipe to select words in segmentation (except lock screen)
- Tap feedback with Taptic Engine
- Fixed: preview unavailable in lock screen
- Fixed: Save to notes issues (iOS 9)

In this version we brought something really amazing to you, such as "safe mode" for widget, and completely redesigned image downloader

# Change list

- Added: Safe mode for widget, makes widget safe when large data is copied
- Improved: Re

In this version we fixed some weird bugs in iOS 8/9, we strongly recommend you upgrade to iOS 10, we can't promise all features works fine in iOS 8/9

# Change list

- Added: Reader mode for preview
- Fixed: Some issues in iOS 8/9
- Fixe

In this version we fixed some weird bugs involved with iCloud, we're still working on Pin 3.0, don't worry about that

# Change list

- Fixed: iCloud issues
- Fixed: Some weird bugs in iOS 8/9
- Improved: Support preview results in segme

In this version we fixed some weird bugs involved with iCloud, we're still working on Pin 3.0, don't worry about that

# Change list

- Fixed: iCloud issues
- Fixed: Some weird bugs in iOS 8/9
- Improved: Support preview results in segme

# Updates

3.0 is the biggest update since Pin was born. In this version we have created an addin system, so that we could install/uninstall addins with a few taps

We call it: xTeko (lab), this actually brought unlimited possibilities for Pin

# Updates

3.0 is the biggest update since Pin was born. In this version we have created an addin system, so that we could install/uninstall addins with a few taps

We call it: xTeko (lab), this actually brought unlimited possibilities for Pin

In the last version we have made a huge update, and also introduced a lot of bugs, we fixed some of them in this version

# New features

- Support for query updates in store
- Support displays information and website for authors in store

In the last version we have made a huge update, and also introduced a lot of bugs, we fixed some of them in this version

# New features

- Support for query updates in store
- Support displays information and website for authors in store

Continue working on xTeko lab

# Fixes

- Some errors caused by opening an addin multi-times
- The issue that can't be shared with text messages in the custom sharing panel
- Pin keyboard layout issues on iPad Pro
- Remove weibo share

Continue working on xTeko lab

# Fixes

- Some errors caused by opening an addin multi-times
- The issue that can't be shared with text messages in the custom sharing panel
- Pin keyboard layout issues on iPad Pro
- Remove weibo share

Continue working on xTeko lab, basically focus on development

# Fixes

- Share sheet issues on iOS 11
- Clipboard issues on the widget
- Editor issue after the script is renamed
- AirDrop file to Pin brings error image to Pin's image

Continue working on xTeko lab, basically focus on development

Continue working on xTeko lab

# Fixes

- Crashes when updating on xTeko store
- Crashes when loading pictures on Pin's image gallery
- Wrong widget height for some cases
- Issues during switch night mode
- Texts are not localized

Continue working on xTeko lab

# Fixes

- Crashes when updating on xTeko store
- Crashes when loading pictures on Pin's image gallery
- Wrong widget height for some cases
- Issues during switch night mode
- Texts are not localized

**** Important ****

Please login your iCloud account for this version, otherwise you get crashes

We will fix this issue as soon as we get a chance, but unfortunately that wont happen in a week because I have no computer, sorry

In the previous version we accidentally introduced a critical issue, many users are affected

We feel so sorry about our mistake, just pushed a fix for it, and also brought some minor improvements

# Fixes

We are going to update our app soon, in the upcoming version, we basically focus on iPhone X improvements.

Besides, if you are seeking for something new on xTeko, please consider upgrade to our new app JSBox.

If can check out our bundle: Upg

We are going to update our app soon, in the upcoming version, we basically focus on iPhone X improvements.

Besides, if you are seeking for something new on xTeko, please consider upgrade to our new app JSBox.

If can check out our bundle: Upg

# What's New

- Added iPhone X support
- Adjusted JSBox Lite (formerly xTeko) to fit the review guidelines
- Supported add JSBox action to Pin

# What's JSBox Pro

It is currently free without any restrictions, and we will offer a higher discount for early supporters.
